channel.title: Christmas on Family Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Christmas on Family Recipes

item.title: Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies
item.description: Ingredients 1 cup of brown sugar 1 cup of sugar 1 cup of butter 2 eggs 2 tsp vanilla 2 tbsp 1% milk 1 tsp baking soda 1 tsp baking powder 1 tsp salt 2 cups of flour 2 cups of quick oats Chocolate chips Walnuts (optional) Recipe Preheat oven to 350 degrees Beat butter and sugar in bowl until creamy. Add eggs, milk, and vanilla and mix until combined. Seperately combine flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.

item.title: Sugar Cookies
item.description: Ingredients 1 cup butter 1 cup of sugar 1 large egg 1 tsp vanilla 2 tsp baking powder 3 cups of flour 3 tbsp milk Recipe Preheat oven to 400 degrees Beat butter and sugar in bowl until creamy. Add egg and vanilla. On low speed mix baking powder and flour into butter mixture until combined. Add milk and beat until dough collects around beaters (approx 2 minutes). Divide dough into thirds.

item.title: Cheesecake Thumbprint Cookies
item.description: Ingredients For the cheesecake filling 4 ounces cream cheese, softened 1/4 cup granulated sugar 1/8 teaspoon salt 1 large egg yolk 1 1/2 teaspoons sour cream 1/4 teaspoon vanilla For the cookie dough 16 tablespoons (1 cup) unsalted butter, softened 1/4 cup granulated sugar 1/4 teaspoon salt 1 large egg yolk 2 cups all-purpose flour Recipe In a mixing bowl, beat cream cheese until light and fluffy. Beat in sugar and salt until smooth.
